Job Description: Key Result Areas:    Generating error-free code and compliance of SOW    Managing development processes working notes    Growing technical skills and be an active part in technical transformation in the company    Supporting team members in achieving their work targets    Reporting on project activities and ensuring timely completion of projects/assignments    Supporting team leaders and members for their work    QC of own work    Significant PHP knowledge, including experience building/customizing object-oriented web-application in PHP.    Past working exposure with Zend Framework, Cake PHP, Laravel, Symfony OR any other MVC focused PHP web application framework that consists set of reusable PHP components/libraries.    Good experience interacting with MySQL database systems through an abstraction layer in addition to the ability to write raw SQL statements.    Basic knowledge with client-side scripting and familiarity with JavaScript libraries and frontend development approaches.    Desired Skill:    Excellent communication skills and up-to-the-mark language proficiency.    Sharp listening, analytical, synthesizing, and problem-solving skills.    Ability to remain professional, confident, and patient at all times.    Quick learner and effective coordinator.
